table.name: ad_associations_from_gwas
table.description:
Associations for this variant to Alzheimer's disease identified in a NIAGADS GWAS summary statistics dataset.
This table can be dynamically filtered by p-value using the paired chart which depicts the p-value distribution for the risk-associations.
By default, the table is filtered for variants whose risk-association is supported by a p-value < 5 x 10-8.

table.name: other_associations_from_gwas
table.description:
Associations for this variant to an AD-related disease, biomarker, or neuropathology identified in a NIAGADS GWAS summary statistics dataset.
This table can be dynamically filtered by p-value using the paired chart which depicts the p-value distribution for the risk-associations.
By default, the table is filtered for variants whose risk-association is supported by a p-value < 5 x 10-8.
